channel.description: Recent content in aws on fn:join

item.title: CDK Template to Launch an EC2 Instance with an Encrypted Root Volume
item.author: contact@fnjoin.com (Salman Malik, Archie Cowan)
item.description: A teammate recently drew my attention to the benefits of Remote Development using SSH, a plugin for VS Code. It provides a local experience for developing remotely. I’ve done remote development with terminals and SSH and my favorite editor for a long time. However, the combination of a full IDE experienece along with the decent terminal experience available in VS Code motivated me to give it a try. In this article, we’ll create a remote development environment with AWS CDK.
